description:
The popular Keen™ Targhee light trail shoe without the waterproof-breathable membrane. The result is enhanced breathability and comfort for three-season use in warmer dryer conditions.

  • Uppers are full-grain leather and mesh, with moisture-wicking lining
  • Midsoles are dual-density, compression-moulded EVA, with underarch TPU shank and Keen S3 heel-stability structures
  • TPU torsion-stability shanks between midsoles and outsoles
  • Outsoles are non-marking carbon rubber with multi-directional lugs
name: Keen Voyageur Light Trail Shoes - Men's
